experience: You and Kelli both know Peter Reno, Anders Tyslan, and 11 others

Get cooking with HelloFresh!At HelloFresh, our mission is to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch, at home. With offices all over the world, we deliver delicious meals to millions of customers, worldwide.  HelloFresh is one of the top three largest companies to come out of Europe over the past four years! Our growth trajectory and expansion has been phenomenal – only three and half years after inception, we are active in nine markets, and on three continents. We are recognized industry leaders—receiving over $300M in investor funding, as well as numerous awards for our outstanding products & service.

What sets us apart from our competitors is that we listen to what your needs are and place experienced personnel in a position to succeed.What we’ve been about since day one:Understanding NeedsAssessing OptionsDelivering SuccessOur pool of professionals enables us to provide top-tier engineers and technical support personnel on contract/temporary basis locally, regionally, and nationally. In a world contingent on keywords and numbers, we look beyond the resume and develop relationships with our contractors and client companies which positions us to provide the quality and success we’re all seeking.Manage full recruitment life-cycle process by sourcing, screening, qualifying, coordinating interviews, negotiating offers, and closing hires.

Bayside Solutions is an industry-leading provider of staff augmentation and consulting services. Since 2001, we’ve built our company around a single concept – relationships. We focus on the people we serve. We’re straightforward, consistent and 100% accountable. We deliver more intelligent solutions that help our clients and candidates thrive. Bottom line, we’ve raised the bar in workforce solutions.Specialize in providing a bridge between candidates seeking new challenges and clients yearning for top industry professionals. Worked with IT Professionals with backgrounds varying from Infrastructure to Software/Application Development to help best place them in a position that matches their career path.•	Manage full recruitment lifecycle process by sourcing, screening, qualifying, coordinating interviews, negotiating offers within different verticals - banking, marketing, advertising, e-commerce etc.•	Run daily meetings with the entire IT department •	Recruited business analysts, technical support analyst, project managers, developers, engineers etc. •	Strategize roadmaps to execute and fulfill requirements by developing pipelines of quality talent•	Interface directly with senior level executives and hiring managers to define talent needs, coordinate interviews, negotiate offers, set meetings, and build relationships•	Successfully manage multiple requirements, tasks, and projects simultaneously in a timely manner•	Utilize sourcing sites, internal ATS/CRM and employee referrals to recruit active and passive candidates•	Build and maintain candidate relationships by providing excellent customer service•	Successfully find talent for technical positions including Project managers, Engineer’s, Developers, and Business Analysts

I had the privilege of working with Kelli during June and July 2013 while performing a job search for an IT security related position.  Kelli really excelled at communication and coordination between the prospective employer and myself.  I know my situation was more challenging than usual because I was working in a different state at the time and was only in California during short windows of time. Kelli really rose to the challenge and managed to coordinate in person interview dates and times that worked for both the prospective employer and myself.  Her professionalism and assistance during the whole process resulted in a great offer within a great organization.  Kelli was recommended to me through a friend and I would have no hesitation in recommending her to my friends and acquaintances that are in the process of a job search.
